choose.when:
select no, category, title, regDate from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, to_char(n.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as regDate from categoryno c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryno and c.no=${categoryNo} and
(n.title like '%${keyword}%' or n.content like '%${keyword}%')
(n.title like '%${keyword}%')
(n.content like '%${keyword}%')
order by no desc )
choose.otherwise: select no, category, title, regDate from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, to_char(n.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as regDate from categoryno c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryno order by no desc )
